basic.description: This course offers a study of photography as a creative means of expression. Topics include 35mm technology and fine black-and-white printmaking.
basic.subject: PGY
basic.title: Photography I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1201C, ART 1203, ART 1300C, ART 1602C, and ART 2003C or ART 2204C.
